Class ScoreManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.managers.ScoreManager
public class ScoreManager extends Object
Manages score persistence and tracking for all game modes. Handles loading/saving scores to files and updating UI displays. Supports Classic mode (highest score), Sprint mode (best time), Ultra mode (best score), and Survival mode (highest level). This class simplifies score management by centralizing file I/O operations.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Phung Yu Jie

  • Method Details

    • setLabels

      public void setLabels(javafx.scene.control.Label highestScoreLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label sprintBestTimeLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label ultraBestScoreLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label survivalHighestLevelLabel)
      Sets UI labels for score display (optional). Updates all displays after setting the labels.
      Parameters:
      highestScoreLabel - Label for displaying highest Classic mode score
      sprintBestTimeLabel - Label for displaying Sprint mode best time
      ultraBestScoreLabel - Label for displaying Ultra mode best score
      survivalHighestLevelLabel - Label for displaying Survival mode highest level

    • getHighestScore

      public int getHighestScore()
      Gets the highest score achieved in Classic mode.
      Returns:
      The highest score value

    • updateHighestScore

      public void updateHighestScore(int newScore)
      Updates the highest score if the new score is greater. Saves to file and updates the display.
      Parameters:
      newScore - The new score to check against the current highest

    • getSprintBestTime

      public long getSprintBestTime()
      Gets the best time achieved in Sprint mode (in milliseconds). Returns Long.MAX_VALUE if no time has been recorded.
      Returns:
      The best time in milliseconds, or Long.MAX_VALUE if no record exists

    • updateSprintBestTime

      public void updateSprintBestTime(long newTime)
      Updates the Sprint best time if the new time is faster. Saves to file and updates the display.
      Parameters:
      newTime - The new time in milliseconds to check against the current best

    • getUltraBestScore

      public int getUltraBestScore()
      Gets the best score achieved in Ultra mode.
      Returns:
      The best Ultra mode score

    • updateUltraBestScore

      public void updateUltraBestScore(int newScore)
      Updates the Ultra best score if the new score is greater. Saves to file and updates the display.
      Parameters:
      newScore - The new score to check against the current best

    • getSurvivalHighestLevel

      public int getSurvivalHighestLevel()
      Gets the highest level reached in Survival mode.
      Returns:
      The highest level achieved

    • updateSurvivalHighestLevel

      public void updateSurvivalHighestLevel(int newLevel)
      Updates the Survival highest level if the new level is greater. Saves to file and updates the display.
      Parameters:
      newLevel - The new level to check against the current highest

    • updateAllDisplays

      public void updateAllDisplays()
      Updates all score displays in the UI. Refreshes all label values on the JavaFX application thread.

    • formatTime

      public static String formatTime(long milliseconds)
      Formats time in milliseconds to MM:SS format. Made public static so it can be used by other classes.
      Parameters:
      milliseconds - The time in milliseconds to format
      Returns:
      A formatted string in MM:SS format
